Game.Overview: Your favorite Shonen Jump heroes jump off the page and duke it out on your screen in J-Stars Victory VS, a 2v2 brawler that features an insane roster filled with manga & anime stars. J-Stars Victory Vs+ invites fans and gamers to play with their favorite manga/anime characters and progress in the JUMP World through different environments recalling Naruto, Dragon Ball Z, One Piece and other memorable moments for every manga and anime fan.
